profile.name: Ashay Kargaonkar
profile.title: Software Engineer / Machine Learning Engineer / Backend Developer / Cloud & API Specialist
hobbies: Playing Online Video games like Valorant and Dota 2 or open to try new ones
skills: REST API design and deployment on AWS
Machine Learning and AI model development
Cloud infrastructure setup with AWS and Azure
Creating test cases and automating deployments

description: Modernized legacy .NET systems by upgrading frameworks, refactoring backend logic using MVC, and migrating to DynamoDB, resulting in improved system performance and reduced maintenance.

Designed and deployed scalable RESTful APIs using C# on AWS, created frontend components with React.js, and architected the overall system including database design, Lambda functions, and table backups.

Built and maintained CI/CD pipelines using Harness, GitHub, and Docker; created Postman collections for testers, implemented unit testing for APIs, and worked closely with QA to resolve bugs quickly and deliver features on time.
Analyzed AWS RDS sensor data with MySQL to identify patterns in room and device usage, uncovering key insights for operational optimization and electricity conservation.
Developed predictive models in R and Python to improve energy efficiency, leveraging statistical analysis and data visualization using matplotlib and Tableau.
Built interactive dashboards to monitor trends and provide insights into room/device utilization.
Analyzed customer data using SQL and Python to predict inventory needs and optimize global distribution through clustering and predictive algorithms.
Developed product recommendation models that led to an 18% increase in sales.
Designed interactive Tableau dashboards to visualize product demand and highlight emerging trends, enabling faster and more informed business decisions.

education.degree: Master of Science in Computer Science

projects.name: ThinkMoves (ChessGrow)
description: Built ThinkMoves â€“ an AI-powered chess analysis platform that converts scanned scoresheets into accurate PGNs.
Developed custom backend logic using .NET for metadata extraction, chess move validation, and PGN generation.
Integrated Azure OCR, TrOCR, YOLO, ResNet, and TensorFlow for image layout classification and handwriting recognition.
Designed a clean and responsive frontend using Next.js and React for file upload, user review, and PGN display.
Deployed backend via AWS App Runner and frontend via Vercel. Leveraged AWS services for authentication, storage, and processing.

projects.name: AshayTalks
description: AshayTalks is an AI chatbot that provides a convenient way for users and recruiters to explore my professional journey.
Frontend built with React and Next.js for a smooth, interactive chat interface. Hosted on Vercel.
Backend in C# .NET, handling data extraction from structured JSON and interacting with GPT-based models for dynamic answers.
Designed to replace traditional resume browsing with a conversational, insight-driven experience.
Planned future enhancements include voice interaction, custom AI persona, and real-time resume updates.

projects.name: Portfolio Website
description: A vibe-coded portfolio website built with Next.js, TypeScript, React, and WindSurf, deployed on Vercel.
Designed for recruiters and visitors to explore my work, connect, and interact via an AI chatbot.
Continuously updated with new projects, features, and UI enhancements.
